description: Derek needed some cash to tide him over till payday so he decided to ask his good friend, Andreas for a short term loan. He figured he would oblige with little hesitation---he was wrong. Andreas wanted his dick for the money! Derek was shocked but he needed the money so desperately that he decided fucking a dude's ass was worth it. And, how? It seems Derek enjoyed a dude's ass more than he expected cuz the load he shoots all over Andreas is thick and creamy and massive.
title: Sucking Andreas
